item.description:
We will have a pot luck lunch and will view the 1949 film, "A
Connecticut Yankee" with Bing Crosby, Rhonda Fleming, William Bendix, and Cedric Hardwicke, a film adaptation of Mark Twain's "A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court." The pot luck will start at 1:30 p.m. and we will show the film at 2:15 pm. Please bring an appetizer, salad, sandwiches, or main dish. We will provide drinks and desserts. We will meet at USNH, 700 Hartford Turnpike in Hamden.
item.name: Pot Luck & Movie -- Mark Twain's "A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court"
